name: Unown S
author: Kazuyuki Kano
flavor_text: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.

poke_power.name: Set
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown S, Unown E, and Unown T on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
